recipes.name: Test Recipe with Measurements
instructions: Start by preparing 2 lb of ground beef. Mix with seasonings and form into patties.
Take 3 lbs of potatoes and wash them thoroughly. Cut into wedges.
Heat the oil in a pan. This will help cook the meat evenly.
Cook the patties for 5 minutes per side. They should be brown and crispy on the outside.
Add the potato wedges to the pan. Season with salt and pepper.
Cover and cook until done. The potatoes should be tender.
